application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Within 3 months of approval being granted further details of the catch pad should be provided demonstrating its acoustic performance in absorbing impact noises from slam ball activities, in accordance with the Noise assessment and Noise management Plan hereby approved. The approved measures shall be retained. Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy D14 of the London Plan 2021 policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Within 3 months of approval being granted, details shall be provided demonstrating how the music noise level is fixed to ensure that it does not exceed LAeq,5mins 75dB when measured at any location within the premises. The approved measures shall be retained and maintained for the lifetime of the development. Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy D14 of the London Plan 2021 policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Details required for condition 6 of planning permission 22/02278/FUL.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: DISIA Surbiton District Centre Inset Area
CONARA Surbiton Town Centre Conservation Area
